org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ui

Class UIElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ui.UIElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionWidget, AlertDialogWidget, ContainerWidget, ErrorWidget, LabelWidget, ListPropertyWidget, PropertyWidget

    public abstract class UIElement
extends java.lang.Object
    The parent class for another UI elements

      The controllable device this widget belongs to

      Element type

      The interface name this element is connected to the remote device

      The object path to the object with the UIContainer Interface
      protected org.alljoyn.bus.ifaces.Properties properties
      The proxy bus object of the remote device
      protected java.lang.Integer sessionId
      The session id in which this object is connected to the remote controlled object
      protected short version
      The interface version

      • versionCheck

        protected void versionCheck()
                     throws ControlPanelException
        Performs version check of this interface version vs. the interface version of the remote device
        Throws:
        ControlPanelException - If the interface version of the remote device is greater than the version of this interface
